object.property: Tests the primitive event listeners and handlers
Every Modelled object is a pub/sub target. Also shows one-time listeners.
Events can be merged into a maximum of 1 event per unit time, or 1 event per animation frame.
Events can have paths, and wildcards will hit all sub-events

Test that amemo() only executes its delegate once.
m = amemo(function(ret) { log('Should only see this once.'); ret(1); }); apar(m, m, m).aseq(aprint)(ret);
arepeat(5, function(ret, a, b) { log(a); ret(1); }).aseq(aprint)(ret);
log('at the start'); aseq(asleep(100), alog('a message'))(ret);
apar(aseq(f1, f1, f1), aseq(f1, f1, f1))(ret);
